trans-unit.resname: PAL05·6 | Genju of the Spires | Card Name
PAL05·6 | Genju of the Spires | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PAL05·6 | Genju of the Spires | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}: Enchanted Mountain becomes a 6/1 red Spirit creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: {2}：直到回合结束，所结附的山脉成为6/1红色的精怪生物。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.resname: PAL05·6 | Genju of the Spires | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When enchanted Mountain is put into a graveyard, you may return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当所结附的山脉进入坟墓场时，你可以将悬峰源兽从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: PAL05·7 | Okina Nightwatch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, CARDNAME gets +3/+3.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的手牌比每位对手都多，翁神社夜巡班便得+3/+3。

trans-unit.resname: PAL05·8 | Skyknight Legionnaire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
